memberdef.name: OTV_LIMIT_CHECK
memberdef.initializer: FT_BEGIN_STMNT \ if ( p + (_count) > otvalid->root->limit ) \ FT_INVALID_TOO_SHORT; \ FT_END_STMNT

memberdef.name: OTV_SIZE_CHECK
memberdef.initializer:
FT_BEGIN_STMNT \ if ( _size > 0 && _size < table_size ) \ { \ if ( otvalid->root->level == FT_VALIDATE_PARANOID ) \ FT_INVALID_OFFSET; \ else \ { \ /* strip off `const' */ \ FT_Byte* pp = (FT_Byte*)_size ## _p; \ \ \ FT_TRACE3(( "
" \ "Invalid offset to optional table `%s'" \ " set to zero.
" \ "
", #_size )); \ \ /* always assume 16bit entities */ \ _size = pp[0] = pp[1] = 0; \ } \ } \ FT_END_STMNT

memberdef.name: OTV_NEST1
memberdef.initializer: FT_BEGIN_STMNT \ otvalid->nesting_level = 0; \ otvalid->func[0] = OTV_FUNC( x ); \ FT_END_STMNT

memberdef.name: OTV_NEST2
memberdef.initializer: FT_BEGIN_STMNT \ otvalid->nesting_level = 0; \ otvalid->func[0] = OTV_FUNC( x ); \ otvalid->func[1] = OTV_FUNC( y ); \ FT_END_STMNT

memberdef.name: OTV_NEST3
memberdef.initializer: FT_BEGIN_STMNT \ otvalid->nesting_level = 0; \ otvalid->func[0] = OTV_FUNC( x ); \ otvalid->func[1] = OTV_FUNC( y ); \ otvalid->func[2] = OTV_FUNC( z ); \ FT_END_STMNT

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* OTV_Validate_Func) (FT_Bytes table, OTV_Validator otvalid)
memberdef.name: OTV_Validate_Func
